Tiffani is an entrepeneur from Austin, TX who spends most of her time running a web-based women's clothing boutique.When she's not working on the website, she loves running with her two big dogs, experimenting with new recipes in the kitchen, or any excuse for a happy hour!

Fun Facts

  • I'm addicted to gummy vitamins
  • I have a weakness for dogs with floppy ears
  • I own a clothing boutique but spend 98% of my time wearing yoga pants
